headline: Show HN: Heyhey – Building a Linktree-like app thought me more than college
description:
Hello Hacker News!

HEYHEY is a service that will hopefully bridge the different parts of people's online life. So far, I've spent about 2 months developing it, and as a college student, it honestly helped me learn more about computer science than any undergrad course we have. Also, after getting the inspiration from HN, I wanted to prove to myself that, in 2022, anyone could build a full-fledged web service alone. Thanks to its modern-yet-traditional infrastructure, HEYHEY is costing me about 0 dollars a month to run (so far!).

I really wanted to keep the service simple and functional. So naturally, I tried to stay away from a JS-based front-end. Instead, HEYHEY uses simple HTML pages with modern CSS and forms to function (you can disable JS!). Last week, I silently turned on registers, and if you register today, you will have a 10% chance to get Pro for life — it enables custom usernames (heyhey.to/[username]) and rich themes.

I am not trying to take over the "Linktree" space, nor trying to build a unicorn startup. After making HEYHEY presentable, I just wanted others to have access to it as well. I hope to keep developing HEYHEY so that it can further integrate with other social platforms while staying lightweight and functional. Would love to hear your feedback!

If you registered and want to delete your account, just shoot an email to: friends@heyhey.to
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 嘿嘿--建立一个类似Linktree的应用程序，让我觉得比大学还难。
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 嘿嘿--建立一個類似Linktree的應用程序，讓我覺得比大學還難。
description_zh-Hans:
你好，Hacker News！

HEYHEY是一项服务，希望能够为人们的在线生活的不同部分架起桥梁。到目前为止，我已经花了大约2个月的时间来开发它，作为一名大学生，说实话，它帮助我学习到的计算机科学知识比我们的任何本科课程都多。另外，从HN获得灵感后，我想向自己证明，在2022年，任何人都可以单独建立一个成熟的网络服务。由于其现代而传统的基础设施，HEYHEY每月的运行成本约为0美元（到目前为止！）。

我真的想保持服务的简单和功能。因此，我自然而然地试图远离基于JS的前端。相反，HEYHEY使用简单的HTML页面和现代的CSS和表单来运作（你可以禁用JS！）。上周，我默默地打开了注册器，如果你今天注册，你将有10%的机会获得终身专业版--它可以实现自定义用户名（heyhey.to/[username]）和丰富的主题。

我不是想接管"Linktree"空间，也不是想建立一个独角兽创业公司。在让HEYHEY变得有模有样之后，我只是想让其他人也有机会使用它。我希望继续开发HEYHEY，使其能够进一步与其他社交平台整合，同时保持轻量级和功能性。很想听到你的反馈！

如果你注册后想删除你的账户，只需发邮件到：friends@heyhey.to
